text:
I. A Catalogue of the Fifty Plants from Chelsea-Garden, presented to the Royal Society, by the Company of Apothecaries, for the Year 1725, pursuant to the Direction of Sir Hans Sloane, Baronet, Pr.Coll.Med. S.P.V.Pr. By Mr. Isaac Rand, Apothecary, F. R. S.

151 Lchimilla vulgaris, C.B. 319.
152 — Alpina, pubescens, minor, H.Reg.Par.
153 Aster Americanus Belvidere foliis, floribus ex cœruleo albicantibus, spicis prælongis. Pluk. Phyt. Tab. 78. f. 5.
154 — Virginianus, angustifolius, serotinus, parvo albente flore, Park. Th. 132.
155 — —, pyramidatus, Hysopi foliis, asperis, calycis squamulis foliaceis.
156 — maritimus flavus, Crithmum chrysanthemum diœus, Raii Hist. 268.
157 Brunella Caroliniana, magno flore, dilute cœruleo; internodiis prælongis.
158 — Novæ Angliæ, major; foliis longius mucronatis.
159 Caucalis Hispanica, Cam. Hort. 37. Fig. xi.
160 Corchorus Americana, prælongis foliis, capsula striata, subrotunda, brevi, Pluk. Phyt. Tab 255. f. 4.
161 Corona Solis Caroliniana, parvis floribus, folio trinervi amplo, aspero, pediculo alato.
162 — — Rapunculi radice, T. Inst. 490
163 Dictamnus Creticus, C.B. 222.
164 Dorycnium Monspeliensium, Lob. Icon. 2. 51.
165 Elichrysum sylvestre, latifolium, capitulis conglobatis, C.B. 264.
166 Eupatorium Senecionis facie, folio Lamii, Par. Bat. Ic. 161.
167 Fænum Græcum, quod Melilotus corniculis reflexis major, C.B. 331.
168 Fumaria minor, tenuifolia, cauliculis procumbentibus & caducis, C.B. 143.
169 Genista Hispanica humilis, floribus congestis villosis. Sparto primo affinis, C.B. 396.
170 Geranium Cicutæ folio, erectum, Romanum, Bocc. Mus. p. 2, 93.
171 — Columbinum erectum, Carolinianum, floribus purpurascenscentibus.
172 Hermannia frutescens, foliis oblongis, ad apices solummodò serratis.
173 Jacobæa Africana, frutescens, flore ample purpureo elegantissimo, Senecionis folio, Volk. Flor. Norimb.
174 Jacobæa Sicula, Chrysanthemi facie, Bocc. rar. p. 66.
175 Lychnidea Virginiana, Holostei ampliore folio, floribus umbellatis, purpureis.
176 Marrubium album, foliis amplis, ferè circinatis.
177 Myosotis Hispanica segetum, T. Inst. 245.
178 — Orientalis persfoliata, Lychnidis folio, T.Cor. 18.
179 Pentaphylloides erectum, J.B. 2. 398.
180 — Canadense, folio Agrimoniæ. Sarracen. D. Vaillant.
181 — Fragariæ folio, Bot. Monsp. App. 309.
182 — — — & crenis obtusioribus.
183 Quinquesfolium rectum luteum, C.B. 325.
184 — quod Pentaphyllum, seu potius Heptaphyllum rectum, caule rubro, hirsutius, H. Cath. Boerh. Ind. 2 40.
185 — minus, flore pallidè luteo, T. Inst. 297.
186 — folio argenteo, C.B. 325.
187 Phlomis fruticosa, humilis, latifolia, candidissima; floribus luteis.
188 — Orientalis, lutea, herbacea, latifolia, verticillata.
189 Sclarea rugoso, verrucoso & laciniato folio, T. Inst. 180.
190 Senecio Ægyptius, folio Matricariae, Boerh. Ind. I. p. 49.
191 Sideritis arvensis, latifolia, glabra, C.B. 233.
192 — Vulgaris hirsuta erecta, C.B. Ib.
193 Serratula annua, seminibus nitidissimis ad basin compressis. Senecio carduus Apulus, Col. p. 1, 32.
194 — —, majoribus & minimè compressis. Crupina Belgarum vulgò.
195 Teucrium Bæticum, Cluf. Hisp. 229.
196 — —, humilius & ramosius, folio subrotundo.
197 Thlaspi arvense, Vaccariae incano folio, majus, C.B. 206.
198 —, Vaccariae incano folio, minus, C.B. Ib.
199 Virga aurea, Canadensis, Asterisci folio, Par. Bat. 244.
200 — —, montana, Scrophulariae folio, Icon. Robert. Pluk. Phyt. Tab. 235 f. 3.

R 2 II. An
